system.effect: Integrates Gellarfield into Void Shields. Suffers +5 to Rolls on Warp Travel Encounter Table. If Vessels Void Shields are damaged by a critical hit, the Gellar fields are also damaged.

description.value: Integrates Gellarfield into Void Shields. Suffers +5 to Rolls on Warp Travel Encounter Table. If Vessels Void Shields are damaged by a critical hit, the Gellar fields are also damaged.
